HPI 8271 Subaru Legacy RS 1993 Rallye Sanremo - Rallye d'Italia 4th Place P. Liatti/A. Allesandrini



The Subaru Impreza 555 debuted in round 9 of the 1993 WRC Champtionship in Finland. However, many of the 11 (!) Subaru team drivers were still driving the previous-generation Legacy RS rally cars. Piero Liatti was one of those drivers, and the only team driver entered in round 11, the Rallye Sanremo.

Liatti & co-driver Alessandro Allessandrini drove their Legacy to 4th place overall, winning 8 stages along the way. This would be the best result for the previous-generation Legacy RS after it was replaced by the Impreza 555. Not a bad result considering something major must have happened along the way based on the photo above.
